description: Study the history and evolution of the Python programming language
Analyze the key features and syntax of Python, including indentation, dynamic typing, and object-oriented programming
Examine popular applications and use cases of Python in fields such as data science, web development, and artificial intelligence
Identify and explore popular Python libraries and frameworks, such as NumPy, pandas, Flask, and Django
Investigate best practices for coding in Python, including coding standards, testing, and debugging
